name: Mitrata
description:
Mitrata

Pitch

Mana is a young woman who wears a long cape, at the beginning of the game her soul is sucked out of her body but she resists and returns. She meets a small will-o'-the-wisp who explains to her that a witch, Pelko, feeds on the souls of the travelers and that it is necessary to release them to overcome her. She will have to free the other wisps by avoiding the black holes that guard them and by solving riddles with the help of the first wisp.

Evolution of character design

Game overview
